name: shards-ui
description: A free, modern and lightweight Bootstrap 4 UI toolkit for web makers.

scripts.css: npm-run-all css-compile css-prefix css-minify && npm run bundlesize
scripts.css-compile:demo: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/extras/scss/shards-demo.scss dist/css/shards-demo.css
scripts.css-compile:extras: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/extras/scss/shards-extras.scss dist/css/shards-extras.css
scripts.css-compile:main: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/shards.scss dist/css/shards.css
scripts.watch-css: nodemon --ignore src/js --ignore dist/ -e scss -x "npm run css"
scripts.watch-html: nodemon --ignore src/js --ignore src/scss --ignore src/extras/js --ignore src/extras/scss --ignore dist/ -e html -x "npm run copy-html"
scripts.watch-images: nodemon --ignore src/js --ignore src/scss --ignore src/extras/js --ignore src/extras/scss --ignore dist/ -e jpg,jpeg,png -x "npm run copy-images"
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --ignore src/scss --ignore dist/ -e js -x "npm run js"

author: Catalin Vasile
